subtitle: This beautiful cheesecake is cooked then chilled and decorated with cream and marzipan.

method.text: Wash clementines and put them into a pan. Cover with water and boil for 25-30 min or until tender. Drain, then quarter, discarding any pips. Put fruit into a food processor with caster sugar and blend until finely pureed. Put aside.
Melt butter in a pan. Stir in crushed biscuits. Press mixture into base of 20 cm loose-bottomed cake tin.
Put cheese, eggs and brown sugar into large bowl and beat together until smooth.
Put cream into a pan. Break in the chocolate and heat until chocolate melts. Beat into cheese mixture, then turn into cake tin.
Drop spoonfuls of clementine puree into cheesecake and swirl a knife through cake.
Cook in oven for 1hr 15 min - 1 hr 30 min until set. Turn off oven and leave cheesecake to cool in oven.

Remove cheesecake from tin. Whip cream and pipe decorative edge. Colour marzipan orange then shape into small balls. Press lightly on fine side of a grater and place a clove in each orange to resemble a stalk. Use to decorate cheesecake.

title: Clementine chocolate cheesecake
